膍膍膍
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 肶, 脾
Связанный символ (и): 肶, селезенка

膍字的基本解释

膍
pí
牛胃：“腊（臘）者之有膍胲，可散而不可散也。”
鸟胃。
厚赐：“乐只君子，福禄膍之。”

膍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》房脂切，平脂，並。］
［《廣韻》部迷切，平齊，並。］
(1)牛胃。参见“膍胲”。
(2)厚。

膍字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膍； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页991第27
【唐韻】房脂切【集韻】【韻會】頻脂切【正韻】蒲麋切，?音毗。【說文】牛百葉也。一曰鳥膍胵。【韻會】百葉，牛肚也。膍胵，鳥之腸胃也。胵音鴟。一曰五藏總名。【博雅】百葉謂之膍。【正字通】李時珍曰：膍，言其有比列也。牛羊食百草，與他獸異，故其胃有脾，有蜂窠，亦與他獸異也。　又【正韻】厚也。　又【廣韻】部迷切【集韻】駢迷切【韻會】邊迷切，?音鼙。【廣韻】膍臍，人臍也。【急就篇】脾腎五藏膍臍乳。　又【正韻】通作脾。引周禮醢人脾析?醢註：脾析，牛百葉也。是膍與脾通用。　【廣韻】亦作肶。

膍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
膍字的起名意思

暂无。

Mutton
Basic explanation of words
Mutton
pí
Niu Stomach: "There is glutinous rice in the wax (la), which can be scattered but not scattered."
Bird stomach.
Huge gift: "Happy gentleman, Fuluchangzhi."
Mutton
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" Fangzhi cut, flat fat, and. ]
["Guangyun" department fan cut, flat, and. ]
(1) Beef stomach. See "Fanghe".
(2) Thick.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of Meat Characters] 　膍; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 991 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Fang Zhi cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Frequency Zhi cut [Zheng Yun] Pu Mo cut, sound admire. [Said the text] Niu Baiye also. One said the bird's mutton. [Rhyme Club] Shutters, tripe. Fatty is also the stomach of a bird. The horned owl. One said the general name of the Five Zangs. [Bo Ya] Baiye is called mutton. [Zhengzitong] Li Shizhen said: Xun, there is a comparison. Cows and sheep eat herbs, which are different from other animals, so their stomachs have spleens and bee nests, which are also different from other animals.　[Zheng Yun] Thick also.　 [Guang Yun] is a fan cut [Ji Yun] Pian fan cut [Yun Hui] side fan cut,? Yin Ku. [Guangyun] The umbilical cord is the human umbilical cord. [Emergency articles] Umbilical milk from the spleen and kidneys and the five Tibetan muttons.　[Zheng Yun] It can be used as the spleen. Quoting Zhou Liyi's analysis of the spleen? Note: Spleen analysis, Niu Baiye also. It is common to both mutton and spleen.　【Guangyun】also known as 肶.

желудок (животного, птицы)
